ca.ualberta.views
Class PasswordActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.views.PasswordActivity

public class PasswordActivity
extends Activity

Activity that allows user's to verify and add passwords. This activity has two behavior states: Verify Password mode and Add New Password mode. The behavior is chosen at runtime based on the MainPreferenceActivity.KEY_PASSWORD_FUNCTION key as specified in the extras bundle. The two values are MainPreferenceActivity.ADD_PASSWORD and MainPreferenceActivity.VERIFY_REMOVE_PASSWORD.
